languages.text: {n}Лицо Ардженты, сильно исхудавшее за последнее время, кажется лицом больного лихорадкой.{/n} "О наконец-то. Близится великая битва, Вольный Торговец. Я жду ее всем сердцем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты, сильно исхудавшее за последнее время, кажется лицом больного лихорадкой.{/n} "О наконец-то. Близится великая битва, Вольный Торговец. Я жду ее всем сердцем".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты, сильно исхудавшее за последнее время, кажется лицом больного лихорадкой.{/n} "О наконец-то. Близится великая битва, Вольный Торговец. Я жду ее всем сердцем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone who is stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone who is stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的脸最近变得有些憔悴，看起来像是发了高烧。{/n}“终于，最终的战斗即将来临，行商浪人。我的心热切地渴望着。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的脸最近变得有些憔悴，看起来像是发了高烧。{/n}“终于，最终的战斗即将来临，行商浪人。我的心热切地渴望着。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Argenta, que últimamente se ha vuelto macilento, parece febril.{/n} «Por fin. La última batalla se aproxima, Comerciante Independiente. Mi corazón la espera con ansia».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Argenta, que últimamente se ha vuelto macilento, parece febril.{/n} «Por fin. La última batalla se aproxima, Comerciante Independiente. Mi corazón la espera con ansia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}ここ最近で憔悴しきったアルジェンタの顔は、まるで熱病に冒された患者のそれのようだ。{/n}「自由開拓者、ついに最後の戦いが近づいてきた。我の心はそれを待ち望んでいる」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}ここ最近で憔悴しきったアルジェンタの顔は、まるで熱病に冒された患者のそれのようだ。{/n}「自由開拓者、ついに最後の戦いが近づいてきた。我の心はそれを待ち望んでいる」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Gesicht, das in letzter Zeit verhärmt ist, wirkt wie das Gesicht einer Fieberkranken.{/n} "Endlich. Die letzte Schlacht naht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Herz erwartet sie sehnsüchtig."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Gesicht, das in letzter Zeit verhärmt ist, wirkt wie das Gesicht einer Fieberkranken.{/n} "Endlich. Die letzte Schlacht naht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Herz erwartet sie sehnsüchtig."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les traits fatigués d'Argenta vous évoquent le visage creusé d'un malade en proie à la fièvre.{/n} « Vous voilà enfin. La bataille finale approche, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mon cœur brûle d'en découdre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les traits fatigués d'Argenta vous évoquent le visage creusé d'un malade en proie à la fièvre.{/n} « Vous voilà enfin. La bataille finale approche, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mon cœur brûle d'en découdre. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın son zamanlarda iyice bitkin bir hâle bürünen yüzü, yüksek ateşten muzdarip birinin yüzünü andırıyor.{/n} "Sonunda. Son savaş yaklaşıyor Hür Tacir. Kalbim hevesle bu savaşı bekliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face, which has grown haggard as of late, looks like the face of someone stricken with fever.{/n} "At last. The final battle approaches, Rogue Trader. My heart awaits it eagerly."
